definition: the subject under discussion/the point at issue
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: What you have said has no bearing on the present subject.
Introduction will describe the significance of choosing the topic.
sentences.chinese: 引言部分将介绍选择本题目的意义。

sentences.english: What he said has not much bearing on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 他所说的话与本题没有多大关系。

sentences.english: In 1858 he sent me a memoir on this subject.
sentences.chinese: 他于1858年，曾寄给我关于本题的一篇论文。

sentences.english: There are thousands of possibilities, some suggested by our readings.
sentences.chinese: 本题有上千种的可能性，有些在读物中有提到过。

sentences.english: What you said is irrelevant to the subject.

definition: problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
to fill a job vacancy/to fill in a blank (e.g. on questionnaire or exam paper)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
true or false?/correct or incorrect/to correct errors (in a document)
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
